calloutPutCommandsHereRunStart: Ovdje dodajte komande koje će se izvršiti prilikom pokretanja
calloutBlocklyPlaceGoUpHere: Place a "go up" block here to go up
calloutClickEvents: Kliknite na zaglavlje događaja kako bi vidjeli blokove događaja funkcije.
calloutUseArrowButtons: Hold down these buttons or the arrow keys on your keyboard to trigger the move events
calloutUseArrowButtonsAutoSteer: We have hidden the code you wrote, but you can still use the arrow keys to move
calloutMoveRightRunButton: Add a second moveRight command to your code.  Then click here to run it
calloutBlocklyMoveRightRunButton: Add a second "move right" command to your code.  Then click here to run it
calloutShowCodeToggle: Click here to switch between block and text mode
calloutShowCodeCanToggle: You can click here to switch back to text mode
calloutShowPlaceGoUpHere: Place goUp command here to move up
calloutShowPlaySound: It's your game, so you choose the sounds now. Try the dropdown to pick a different sound.
calloutInstructions: Don't know what to do? Click the instructions to see them again
calloutPlaceTwo: Can you make two Mouse Droids appear when you get one Mouse Droid?
calloutPlaceTwoWhenTauntaun: Can you make two Mynocks appear when you get a Tauntaun?
calloutSetDroidAndSpeed: Set your droid and its speed
calloutFinishButton: Click here when you are ready to share your game
calloutBlocklyCategories: You can click on Commands to see all your commands and Events to see all the events
dropletBlock_addCharacter_param0_descrip: The type of the character to be added ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_addPoints_param0_descriptio: The value to add to the score.
dropletBlock_changeScore_param0_descript: The value to add to the score (negative values will reduce the score).
dropletBlock_goRight_description: Moves the droid to the right.
dropletBlock_goLeft_description: Moves the droid to the left.
dropletBlock_moveRight_description: Moves the character to the right.
dropletBlock_moveSlow_description: Changes a set of characters to move slowly.
dropletBlock_moveSlow_param0_description: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_moveNormal_description: Changes a set of characters to move at a normal speed.
dropletBlock_moveNormal_param0_descripti: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_moveFast_description: Changes a set of characters to move quickly.
dropletBlock_moveFast_param0_description: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: The name of the sound to play.
dropletBlock_removePoints_param0_descrip: The value to remove from the score.
dropletBlock_setBackground_param0_descri: The name of the background theme ('random', 'forest', 'snow', or 'ship').
dropletBlock_setDroid_param0_description: The name of the droid image ('random', 'R2-D2', or 'C-3PO').
dropletBlock_setSpritePosition_descripti: Odmah premješta lik na zadanu poziciju.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param0_descriptio: The index (starting at 0) indicating which actor should change.
dropletBlock_setSprite_param1_descriptio: The name of the actor image.
dropletBlock_setToChase_description: Changes a set of characters to chase the bot.
dropletBlock_setToChase_param0_descripti: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setToFlee_description: Changes a set of characters to flee from the bot.
dropletBlock_setToFlee_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setToRoam_description: Changes a set of characters to roam freely.
dropletBlock_setToRoam_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setToStop_description: Changes a set of characters to stop moving.
dropletBlock_setToStop_param0_descriptio: The type of characters to be changed ('random', 'man', 'pilot', 'pig', 'bird', 'mouse', 'roo', or 'spider').
dropletBlock_setMap_description: Changes the map in the scene.
dropletBlock_setMap_param0_description: The name of the map ('random', 'blank', 'circle', 'circle2', 'horizontal', 'grid', or 'blobs').
dropletBlock_endGame_param0_description: Whether the game was won or lost ('win', 'lose').
dropletBlock_whenDown_description: This function executes when the down button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenGetCharacter_descriptio: This function executes when the droid gets any character.
dropletBlock_whenGetStormtrooper_descrip: This function executes when the droid gets Stormtrooper characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetRebelPilot_descripti: This function executes when the droid gets Rebel Pilot characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetPufferPig_descriptio: This function executes when the droid gets Puffer Pig characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetMynock_description: This function executes when the droid gets Mynock characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetMouseDroid_descripti: This function executes when the droid gets Mouse Droid characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetTauntaun_description: This function executes when the droid gets Tauntaun characters.
dropletBlock_whenGetProbot_description: This function executes when the droid gets Probot characters.
dropletBlock_whenLeft_description: This function executes when the left button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenRight_description: This function executes when the right button is pressed.
dropletBlock_whenTouchCharacter_descript: This function executes when the character touches any character.
dropletBlock_whenTouchObstacle_descripti: This function executes when the character touches any obstacle.
dropletBlock_whenTouchStormtrooper_descr: This function executes when the droid touches Stormtrooper characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchRebelPilot_descrip: This function executes when the droid touches Rebel Pilot characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchPufferPig_descript: This function executes when the droid touches Puffer Pig characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchMynock_description: This function executes when the droid touches Mynock characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchMouseDroid_descrip: This function executes when the droid touches Mouse Droid characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchTauntaun_descripti: This function executes when the droid touches Tauntaun characters.
dropletBlock_whenTouchProbot_description: This function executes when the droid touches Probot characters.
dropletBlock_whenUp_description: This function executes when the up button is pressed.
endGameTooltip: End the game as either a win or a loss.
hoc2015_reinfFeedbackMsg: You can press the "{backButton}" button to go back to playing your game.
hoc2015_move_right_instructions: "We need that scrap metal [scrapmetal1]. BB-8, can you get it?"
hoc2015_move_right_down_instructions: "We need more scrap metal [scrapmetal2]. Can you get all the metal in this area?"
hoc2015_move_finale_instructions: "We need 4 more pieces of metal [scrapmetal2]. Can you find them?"
hoc2015_event_two_items_instructions: "R2-D2, I need you to get a critical message to the Rebel Pilots [rebelpilot]."
hoc2015_event_two_items_instructions2: Make R2-D2 move when you use the arrow keys.
hoc2015_event_four_items_instructions: "Get to all of the Rebel Pilots [rebelpilot] as quickly as you can."
hoc2015_score_instructions2: Let's add points. Add points when R2-D2 gets each Rebel Pilot [rebelpilot].  Get 900 points to win.
hoc2015_win_lose_instructions2: Add 100 points when R2-D2 gets a Rebel Pilot [rebelpilot]. Remove 100 when he gets a Stormtrooper [stormtrooper]. Get 200 points to pass the puzzle. (You can use the Mynock [mynock] to make it easier.)
hoc2015_add_characters_instructions: "I'm seeing signs of increased activity on this planet."
hoc2015_add_characters_instructions2: Add three Puffer Pigs [pufferpig] to the planet. Then, go get them.
hoc2015_chain_characters_instructions2: When you get a Tauntaun [tauntaun], make two or more Mynocks [mynock] appear.  Get 8 Mynocks.
hoc2015_multiply_characters_instructions: Can you make two or more Mouse Droids [mousedroid] appear every time R2-D2 gets one Mouse Droid?  Get 20 Mouse Droids.
hoc2015_change_setting_instructions2: Use the new commands to change your droid and its speed.  Then, get the Rebel Pilots [rebelpilot].
hoc2015_event_free_instructions2: You have all the tools you need now to create your own puzzle. Feel free to explore and play with all the different Commands and Events. When you're done, press the Finish button to continue.
makeProjectileTooltip: Napravi da projektil koji se sudario nestane ili da se odbije.
moveDistanceTooltip: Pomiče lik za zadanu udaljenost i u zadanom smjeru.
numBlocksNeeded: Ovaj zadatak se može riješiti sa %1 blokova.
onEventTooltip: Execute code in response to the specified event.
positionMiddleCenter: na položaj u sredinu središnjeg dijela
reinfFeedbackMsg: You can press the "Keep Playing" button to go back to playing your story.
repeatForeverTooltip: Ponavljaj izvršavanje akcija u ovom bloku, dok god se priča igre događa.
saySpriteTooltip: Zadanom liku stvara strip-dijalog-oblak s pripadnim tekstom.
setActivityTooltip: Sets the activity for a set of items
setDroidSpeedRandom: set droid to a random speed
setDroidSpeedSlow: set droid to a slow speed
setDroidSpeedNormal: set droid to a normal speed
setDroidSpeedFast: set droid to a fast speed
setDroidSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of the droid
setItemSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed for a set of items
setScoreTextTooltip: Postavlja tekst koji će biti prikazan u području za prikaz bodova.
setSpritePositionTooltip: Odmah premješta lik na zadanu poziciju.
setMapTooltip: Changes the map in the scene
shareStudioTwitter: Pogledaj priču koju sam smislio/la. Napisao/la sam je sam/a s @codeorg
showCoordinatesTooltip: na ekranu pokazuje koordinate glavnog lika
showTitleScreenTooltip: Pokazuje početni ekran s odgovarajućim naslovom i tekstom.
startSetVars: game_vars (title, subtitle, background, target, danger, player)
waitParamsTooltip: Čeka određeni broj sekundi ili koristi nulu da bi čekao dok se ne klikne.
waitTooltip: Čeka određeno vrijeme ili dok se ne klikne.
whenArrowTooltip: Izvršava dolje navedene akcije kada se pritisne određena tipka sa strelicom.
whenDownTooltip: Izvrši sljedeće akcije kad se pritisne tipka dolje.
whenGameStartsTooltip: Izvršava sljedeće akcije kad priča započne.
whenGetAllCharactersTooltip: Execute the actions below when the droid gets all the characters.
whenGetAllCharacterClassTooltip: Execute the actions below when the droid gets all characters of a type.
whenGetCharacterTooltip: Execute the actions below when an actor gets the specified type of character.
whenLeft: kada se pritisne strelica prema lijevo
whenLeftTooltip: Izvrši sljedeće akcije kad se pritisne strelica prema lijevo.
whenRight: kada se pritisne strelica prema desno
whenRightTooltip: Izvrši sljedeće akcije kad se pritisne strelica prema desno.
whenSpriteClickedTooltip: Izvršava dolje navedene akcije kada se klikne na lik.
whenSpriteCollidedTooltip: Izvršava dolje navedene akcije kada lik dotakne neki drugi lik.
whenTouchCharacterTooltip: Execute the actions below when the actor touches a character.
whenTouchObstacleTooltip: Execute the actions below when the actor touches an obstacle.
whenTouchGoalTooltip: Execute the actions below when the actor touches a goal.
whenUpTooltip: Izvrši sljedeće akcije kad se pritisne strelica prema gore.
failedHassetDroidSpeed: Next time, set a droid speed.
failedTouchAllItems: Next time, get all the items.
failedScoreMinimum: Next time, reach the minimum score.
failedRemovedItemCount: Next time, get the right number of items.
failedSetActivity: Next time, set the correct character activity.
failedAvoidHazard: "Uh oh, a Bandit got you!  Try again."
failedHasAllGoals: "Try again, BB-8.  Get all the scrap metal."
failedTwoItemsTimeout: You need to get the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move, put the goUp and goDown commands inside the whenUpKey and whenDownKey functions. Then, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move quickly.
failedTwoItemsTimeoutBlockly: You need to get the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move, attach the "go up" and "go down" blocks to the "when up arrow" and "when down arrow" blocks. Then, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move quickly.
failedFourItemsTimeout: The game ran out of time.  Try pressing and holding the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move faster.  If the keys don't work, check that you have goUp inside whenUp, and so on.
failedFourItemsTimeoutBlockly: The game ran out of time.  Try pressing and holding the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move faster.  If the keys don't work, check that you have "go up" inside "when up arrow", and so on.
failedScoreTimeout: Try to reach all the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedScoreScore: You got the Rebel Pilots, but you need at least 900 points to pass the puzzle. Use the addPoints command to add lots of points when you get a Rebel Pilot.
failedScoreScoreBlockly: You got the Rebel Pilots, but you need at least 900 points to pass the puzzle. Use the "add points" block to add lots of points when you get a Rebel Pilot.
failedScoreGoals: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place. Can you put it inside the whenGetRebelPilot function so R2-D2 can't get points until he gets a Rebel Pilot?
failedWinLoseTimeout: Try to reach all the Rebel Pilots before time runs out. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseScore: You need 200 points to pass the puzzle. Try adding more points with the addPoints command. You can use the Mynock to make it easier. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseScoreBlockly: You need 200 points to pass the puzzle. Try adding more points with the "add points" block. You can use the Mynock to make it easier. To move faster, press and hold the arrow keys on your keyboard (or screen).
failedWinLoseGoals: You used the addPoints command, but not in the right place. Can you make it so that the command is only called when you get the Rebel Pilot? Also, remove points when you touch the Stormtrooper.
failedWinLoseGoalsBlockly: You used the "add points" block, but not in the right place. Can you make it so that the block only executes when you get the Rebel Pilot? Also, remove points when you touch the Stormtrooper.
failedAddCharactersTimeout: Use three addCharacter commands at the top of your program to add Puffer Pigs when you hit run. Now go get them.
failedAddCharactersTimeoutBlockly: Use three "add a Puffer Pig" blocks at the top of your program to add Puffer Pigs when you hit run. Now go get them.
failedChainCharactersTimeout: You need to get 8 Mynocks. Can you make two (or more) of them appear every time you get a Tauntaun? Make it easier by adding more Mynocks.
failedChainCharactersTimeoutGotSome: Congratulations, you added code to make Mynocks. You can go to the next puzzle or try again to get 8 of them.
failedMultiplyCharactersTimeout: You need to get 20 Mouse Droids.  Make sure you add two or more Mouse Droids every time you get one.
failedMultiplyCharactersTimeoutBlockly: You need to get 20 Mouse Droids. Use the "add a Mouse Droid" command inside the "when get Mouse Droid" event to add two or more Mouse Droids every time you get one.
failedMultiplyCharactersTimeoutGotSome: Congratulations, you added code to make Mouse Droids. You can go to the next puzzle or try again to get 20 Mouse Droids. Try making it easier by adding more of them! (Press and hold the keys on your keyboard (or screen) to move faster.)
failedChangeSettingTimeout: Get three Rebel Pilots to move on.
failedChangeSettingSettings: Make the game your own. To pass this puzzle, you need to change your droid and set its speed.
